def main():
    n = int(input())
    teams = [int(x) for x in input().split()]

    # print(n)
    # print(teams)

    # sort teams
    teams.sort()

    # print(teams)

    # find sum of all teams
    sum_teams = sum(teams)

    # print(sum_teams)

    # find sum of all teams except the last one
    sum_teams_except_last = sum_teams - teams[-1]

    # print(sum_teams_except_last)

    result = sum_teams_except_last + teams[-1] * n

    # print(result)

    print(result)


if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()

N = int(input())

print(sum(times) - max(times))

import sys

def main():
    n = int(input())
    teams = list(map(int, input().split()))
    teams.sort()
    #print(teams)
    min_time = 0
    for i in range(n):
        min_time += teams[i] * (n - i)
    print(min_time)
    return

if __name__ == "__main__":
    main()

N = int(input())
times = tuple(map(int, input().split()))

print(max(sum(times[::2]), sum(times[1::2])))
